string.value: Go to #p2030012# and make the Growth Accelerant as instructed by the mission assignment you found behind the #p2012034#. #b#p2030012##k is in the #b#m200081201##k.
You received the Growth Accelerant from #p2030012#. Go back to the secret room and put the Growth Accelerant behind the brick.

The only people who come all the way here are adventurers or those who need my research results. Do you fall under the former or the latter? 
#L0##bFormer#l
#L1#Latter#l
#k

Ah, how nice to meet someone in need of my research results! It's been a while. So, what would you like to make?
#L0##bGrowth Accelerant#l
#L1#Hair-Regrowth Medication#l
#L2#Diet Pills#l
#k

Growth Accelerant? I've completed my research pertaining to the Growth Accelerant ages ago, but I haven't really made it because the ingredients are so hard to find. Do you know what ingredients are required to make it?
#L0##b10 Cellion Tails, 10 Lioner Tails, 10 Grupin Tails, and 10 Fierry's Wings#l
#L1#10 Cellion Tails, 10 Lioner Tails, 10 Grupin Tails, and 100 Fierry's Tentacles#l
#L2#10 Cellion Tails, 10 Lioner Tails, 10 Grupin Tails, and 10 Fierry's Tentacles#l
#k
I'm glad you know the ingredients. I will make you the Growth Accelerant as soon you bring me the required ingredients.
You must be on an adventure. Take some time to rest here if you wish.
I'm sorry, but I don't know how to make such thing since I show no signs of balding. Haha.
Hm, it doesn't seem like you need to go on a diet. Exercise is the healthiest way to keep your body in shape.
I have no idea what you can make with those ingredients.
I have no idea what you can make with those ingredients.
I can make it in a second if you just bring me the ingredients. Go on and bring me the #bingredients for the Growth Accelerant#k.
I can't make anything without proper ingredients...
You've found all the ingredients I need to make the Growth Accelerant. But why do you need the Growth Accelerant anyway? Well, I suppose that's none of my business. I'll make it for you in a few.
If consumed by an animal, it will have unimaginable side effects. It should only be used on plants.
You don't seem to have to ingredients for the Growth Accelerant yet. #bYou know what the ingredients are better than I do.#k
